price: 141. Xusuusta markaan idinka samata bixinnay reer Fircoon ee idin dhadhansii- yey cadaab daran, iyagoo dilayey wiilashiin- na, oo u deynayey haweenkiinna nolol (si ay ugu adeegtaan). Arrinkaana waxaa ku sugnaa imtixaan weyn xagga Rabbigiin ah.
arabic: وَإِذۡ أَنجَيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يُقَتِّلُونَ أَبۡنَآءَكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيُونَ نِسَآءَكُمۡۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكُم بَلَآءٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh anjaynākum min āli fir'ʿawna yasūmūnakum sūa al-ʿadhābi yuqattilūna abnāakum wayastaḥyūna nisāakum wafī dhālikum balāon min rabbikum ʿaẓīmun
